comment:
"I produced a monthly podcast for the alt paper New York Press. Each podcast was roughly 15 minutes long. Each episode was a feature about a particular NYC band and included an interview and live recording of the band. 

I was paid $250 for each episode. Payment came about a month after publication.

Unfortunately, the paper folded 1 year after they started releaseing the podcst."
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication
